meanings.sent3: The semantically decorated classroom confused the students, who were expecting a more traditional setup.
meanings.sent4: Her semantically structured argument dismantled all opposition during the debate.
meanings.sent5: The semantically rich vocabulary of the poem painted vivid images in the readers' minds.
